message:
Command `python3 - << 'PY'
from pathlib import Path
p = Path('/workspace/pylint/pylint/checkers/similar.py')
old = p.read_text()
# produce a unified diff between a version without the min_lines check and the current
orig = old.replace('        # Disable similarity check when configured with non-positive value\n        if self.min_lines <= 0:\n            return []\n\n', '')
import difflib
diff = difflib.unified_diff(orig.splitlines(keepends=True), old.splitlines(keepends=True), fromfile='a/pylint/pylint/checkers/similar.py', tofile='b/pylint/pylint/checkers/similar.py')
print(''.join(diff))
PY` executed with exit code 0.

+            return []

extras.command:
python3 - << 'PY'
from pathlib import Path
p = Path('/workspace/pylint/pylint/checkers/similar.py')
old = p.read_text()
# produce a unified diff between a version without the min_lines check and the current
orig = old.replace('        # Disable similarity check when configured with non-positive value\n        if self.min_lines <= 0:\n            return []\n\n', '')
import difflib
diff = difflib.unified_diff(orig.splitlines(keepends=True), old.splitlines(keepends=True), fromfile='a/pylint/pylint/checkers/similar.py', tofile='b/pylint/pylint/checkers/similar.py')
print(''.join(diff))
PY
